<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### processMCDCRecord() {#adbbbd2393a335a673e48fc85db8471f3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCDCRecord anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoverageMapping.cpp&#125;::MCDCRecordProcessor::processMCDCRecord ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the MC/DC <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> in order to produce a result for a boolean expression.

This process includes tracking the conditions that comprise the decision region, calculating the list of all possible test vectors, marking the executed test vectors, and then finding an Independence Pair out of the executed test vectors for each condition in the boolean expression. A condition is tracked to ensure that its <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> can be mapped to its ordinal position in the boolean expression. The condition&#39;s source location is also tracked, as well as whether it is constant folded (in which case it is excuded from the metric).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l00521">521</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### findExecutedTestVectors() {#adfeabe801fd5c127bd5ed35e41d100cf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoverageMapping.cpp&#125;::MCDCRecordProcessor::findExecutedTestVectors ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Walk the bits in the bitmap.

A bit set to &#39;1&#39; indicates that the test vector at the corresponding index was executed during a test run.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l00493">493</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### Bitmap {#a05858e4a24067cfb179aa72b10860304}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const BitVector&amp; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoverageMapping.cpp&#125;::MCDCRecordProcessor::Bitmap</>}>
A bitmap representing the executed test vectors for a boolean expression.

Each index of the bitmap corresponds to a possible test vector. An index with a bit value of &#39;1&#39; indicates that the corresponding Test Vector identified by that index was executed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l00410">410</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
